title: [Whinge] How can i level my smurf...
body:
...If it takes 6-10 minutes to find a game.
...If those games end up being remakes.
...If games are remade 3 times in a row.

Did i do something wrong Rito? 

I would have thought that being a smurf account and it being low elo, that it would have plenty of other players to find games with. However, the last 6/7 games have all had some of the same players. 

Does Riot still try to match smurfs with other smurfs that causes long queue times?

replies.body: Honest suggestion, just play bots, it's easier than wading through the low level shit, and easier then the wait times.

As Hank(?) said above, the XP is indeed shitter, not to mention its a constant 2-3/5 with all the bots boosting accounts that are literal deadweight.

Some of these bots stand afk in lane about 2 towers back for a few minutes at a time before walking into lane and feeding.
Since its a 1v2 lane most of the time, i cant even cs effectively or get kills, and it doesnt help when one of the Riot Bots walks into your lane going 14/0 because bots feed hardcore.

I think you would need to get a group of 5 to queue with in coop to ensure games that arnt drawn out too long or lost due to 2v5 scenarios.

yeah, you make a really valid point, cheers.

(Gonna have to play on legacy Client tho i think)
Here is a good resource [Smurf leveling guide](https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/comments/3ivlup/youre_thinking_about_leveling_a_smurf_here_are/)

Bot games give fuck all experience.

If you really want to power level your account to 30, buy double exp boosters and spam twisted treeline when its up or summoners rift. can get a new account from 1 to 30 with that in less than 3 days if you play regularly enough.
can you define "regularly" in the number of hours per day?
